page.title: 20ART IN UPPER WHARFEDALE
page.content:
{Upper Wharfedale,}because it is an area of outstanding natural beauty, situated in limestone countryside and bisected by the{River Wharfe}attracts many artists, both local and from much further afield. Tiny hamlets and villages dot the area and most of the buildings are old and so they offer great potential for the professional and the amateur artist who is seeking either financial reward or simply personal satisfaction. There are many outlets for artistic works,especially during the summer when tourists arrive and so there are a number of{Art Festivals}over these months.Here work is displayed from both the professional and the amateur.
{Information compiled by the pupils of {Threshfield Primary School.
